lead_paragraph: British slalom canoeist Fiona Pennie is leaving nothing to chance at this year's Rio Olympics where she will fit a mosquito net to her boat between races to minimize the threat of the Zika virus.

headline.print_headline: British Canoeist Pennie Has Novel Answer to Zika Threat
headline.main: British Canoeist Pennie Has Novel Answer to Zika Threat

snippet: British slalom canoeist Fiona Pennie is leaving nothing to chance at this year's Rio Olympics where she will fit a mosquito net to her boat between races to minimize the threat of the Zika virus....
